Defines

STOP_mode_entry
[PWR_Exported_Constants]

Defines

#define PWR_STOPEntry_WFI   ((uint8_t)0x01)
#define PWR_STOPEntry_WFE   ((uint8_t)0x02)
#define IS_PWR_STOP_ENTRY(ENTRY)   (((ENTRY) == PWR_STOPEntry_WFI) || ((ENTRY) == PWR_STOPEntry_WFE))
